title: Traditional Chinese medicine preparation Shuang-Huang-Lian in the treatment of influenza: A review.
abstract: As one of the top 10 traditional Chinese medicine preparations to treat influenza in China, the polysaccharides in Shuang-Huang-Lian (SHL) are always removed, while the polysaccharides often have excellent effects in treating influenza. Till now, the summarized chemical profile, anti-influenza substances and mechanism of SHL, especially for the polysaccharides, were not provided, dramatically restricting its product development.
